Your Personalized Recovery Plan

Solveig’s shedding has steadied and those new baby hairs are proof her follicles are waking up. Both chronic stress and long‑term hormonal treatment can’t be turned off overnight, but she now has a plan that anchors sleep, eases her stress load, and strengthens nutrition to restore balance. At this regrowth‑start point, steady routines turn fragile fuzz into lasting thickness. Confidence grows as her scalp calms and strength returns. ✨

Small daily actions now turn slow regrowth into visible transformation.
